select id, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, deleted, complaint_type, complaint_object, object_id, location, longitude, latitude, contact_user, contact_mobile, complaint_reason, image, status, equip_status, accept_user_id, (select nick_name from sys_user where user_id = accept_user_id and deleted = 0) as acceptUser, accept_organization, accept_time, accept_result, assign_accept_user_id from tb_travel_complaint complaint
id = #{id} and deleted = 0

select id as id, CASE WHEN complaint_type = 0 THEN complaint_object WHEN complaint_type = 1 THEN '景区名称' WHEN complaint_type = 2 THEN '酒店名称' ELSE '其他' END as complaintObject, object_id as objectId, complaint_type as complaintType, CASE WHEN complaint_type = 0 THEN '其他' WHEN complaint_type = 0 THEN '其他' WHEN complaint_type = 0 THEN '其他' ELSE '-' END as complaintTypeDesc, status as status, CASE WHEN status = 0 THEN '待指派' WHEN status = 1 THEN '待处理' WHEN status = 2 THEN '已处理' ELSE '-' END as statusDesc, equip_status as equipStatus, CASE WHEN equip_status = 0 THEN '启用' WHEN equip_status = 1 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END as equipStatusDesc, create_time as createTime from tb_travel_complaint
complaint_object LIKE CONCACT('%', '${params.complaintObject}', '%') and
object_id = #{params.object_id} and
complaint_type = #{params.complaintType} and
status = #{params.status} and
equip_status = #{params.equipStatus} and
accept_user_id = #{params.acceptUserId} and
create_user = #{params.createUser} and
create_time >= #{params.beginTime} and create_time <= #{params.endTime} and
deleted = 0
ORDER BY create_time DESC

select
(select count(id) from tb_travel_complaint
equip_status = #{params.equipStatus} and
create_user = #{params.createUser} and
deleted = 0
) as total,
(select count(id) from tb_travel_complaint
equip_status = #{params.equipStatus} and
accept_user_id = #{params.acceptUserId} and
status = 1 and deleted = 0
) as noDeal,
(select count(id) from tb_travel_complaint
equip_status = #{params.equipStatus} and
accept_user_id = #{params.acceptUserId} and
status = 2 and deleted = 0
) as dealFinished

select CASE WHEN status = 1 THEN (select name from tb_scenic deleted = 0 and status = 1) WHEN status = 2 THEN '酒店' ELSE complaint_object END as name, COUNT(id) as value, from tb_travel_complaint
GROUP BY object_id
GROUP BY complaint_object
ORDER BY value DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time,#{params.sqlDateFormat}) as time, COUNT(id) as count from tb_travel_complaint
create_time like concat(YEAR(now())-1,'%') and equip_status = 0 and deleted = 0
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time,#{params.sqlDateFormat})
